subject: Monte Carlo Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal extended his Monte Carlo Masters winning streak to 44 matches by beating Philipp Kohlschreiber, and second-ranked Andy Murray was routed by Stanislas Wawrinka.
snippet: Rafael Nadal extended his Monte Carlo Masters winning streak to 44 matches by beating Philipp Kohlschreiber, and second-ranked Andy Murray was routed by Stanislas Wawrinka.
